Posts.Content: thePuppetLady wrote: hi all, my name is Ellen and I've just been diagnosed with Breast Cancer.  I am also the Puppet Lady--I teach puppetry to kids in Southern Ca schools.  I'm so glad to have found this forum.  I am terrified yet so overwhelmed with the support and love I've already received.  My journey is just starting.  My diagnosis was 4 days ago.  Mammo, sono, core biopsy...it's in a couple of lymph nodes.  I see a Breast Surgeon and an Oncologist.  Today is Doctor Day for the Puppet Lady.  I discovered this forum during my 4 days of absolute hell waiting for the confirmation.  Don't ever want to feel that fear again.  I bookmarked and just knew I'd be back to join.  thank you for this forum...it'll save what sanity I have left, lol Dx 9/20/2010, IDC, 2cm, Stage IIB, Grade 3, 4/16 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Starting My Journey thePuppetLady lago
